> [realjohndoe](#comment_24_15tQJFZZ7KVYMX6XPUkcs138LcgDQ2zVcL): The beautiful thing is that everyone can come together on #Zeronet and have their voices heard. You cant do that on #Facebook, #Twitter Etc. On Twitter et al, your differences are used to keep you apart, divide and conquer you. Commercial social media functions as totalitarian regimes, under the complete control of the money changers on Wall Street. Zeronet seems to be a real alternative. A place where people with strong differences can come together on pressing important issues most agree on. Like healthcare. [...]
